Post: "My best mate is upset about me leaving for uni, which means our friendship was never meant to last and I'll probably end up losing all my friends and being lonely in college too."

Event: Missing how things used to be
Post: "Missing how things used to be... I guess that means I'll never be able to get back what's lost and I'm just stuck in this rut forever."

Event: I'll be a lonely old cat woman
Post: "I'll be a lonely old cat woman, which means I'm probably going to be unhappy and unfulfilled in all aspects of my life, never having a loving partner or family, and just existing with my cats as my only comfort."
"Having a bad day, which means I'm probably going to have a terrible week, month, and year - everything is just falling apart!"
"My camera stopped working, which means I'm probably going to be unlucky and have everything I own break down on me; I'll never be able to capture life's precious moments again."
"I missed my graduation ceremony, which means I've probably messed up every important milestone in my life and will never achieve anything significant."
"I lost another friend; this just proves that I'm not capable of maintaining any meaningful relationships in my life and I'll probably end up alone and unhappy."
"I'm so bored, which means I'll probably never find anything interesting in life and will just be stuck in a rut forever."

Event: I want to be 19 and fit again, but can't.
Post: "I'll never be able to get back in shape, which means I'm probably going to struggle with my health and fitness for the rest of my life, and it's going to hold me back from achieving all my goals and dreams."
"I miss my auntie's dogs; it just shows how lonely and unlovable I must be that even animals don't want to be around me."
"My friend was not impressed; I must be boring and uninteresting, which means nobody will ever want to hang out with me or listen to what I have to say."

Event: I had to use a laptop touchpad instead of my Wacom mouse.
Post: "I had to use a laptop touchpad instead of my Wacom mouse, which means I'm probably going to be unproductive and unsuccessful in all my creative pursuits from now on."
"House hunting was not fun; I guess this means I'll never be able to find happiness or stability in my personal and professional life."
"Took too much Sudafed and now I'm going to be dependent on medication for the rest of my life, which means I'll never be able to fully take care of myself or live a healthy lifestyle."

"I don't have a phone, which means I'm going to be disconnected from everyone and fall behind in everything I do, whether it's staying in touch with friends, finding a job, or even just navigating the world - I'm basically doomed to be out of the loop forever."
"I received an uncomfortable announcement, which means my whole life is probably going to be filled with awkward moments and social failures."
"I'm all alone, which means I'm probably going to be unhappy and unfulfilled in every aspect of my life, never finding true friendship or love."
"I broke the bathroom, which means I'm probably going to be careless and destructive in every aspect of my life, from my relationships to my career."
"Losing a best friend is just the beginning of my downward spiral; I'll probably lose all my friends and be completely isolated for the rest of my life."
"They took my property, which means I'm probably going to lose everything else in life too - my sense of security, my financial stability, even my identity."
"Traffic is horrific, which means I'm going to be late for everything and my whole day will be ruined, affecting not just my work but also my personal relationships and overall well-being."
